entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_MODE_FLAG_SPEAKER_ON
entry.description: The device can play input audio stream (e.g., speaker is on).

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_MODE_FLAG_MIC_ON
entry.description: The device generate audio stream (e.g., microphone is on).

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_8_000_HZ
entry.description: Adequate for human speech but without sibilance. Used in telephone/walkie-talkie.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_11_025_HZ
entry.description: Used for lower-quality PCM, MPEG audio and for audio analysis of subwoofer bandpasses.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_16_000_HZ
entry.description: Used in most VoIP and VVoIP, extension of telephone narrowband.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_22_050_HZ
entry.description: Used for lower-quality PCM and MPEG audio and for audio analysis of low frequency energy.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_24_000_HZ
entry.description: Used for lower-quality PCM and MPEG audio and for audio analysis of low frequency energy.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_44_100_HZ
entry.description: Audio CD, most commonly used rate with MPEG-1 audio (VCD, SVCD, MP3). Covers the 20 kHz bandwidth.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_48_000_HZ
entry.description: Standard sampling rate used by professional digital video equipment, could reconstruct frequencies up to 22 kHz.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_88_200_HZ
entry.description: Used by some professional recording equipment when the destination is CD, such as mixers, EQs, compressors, reverb, crossovers and recording devices.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_96_000_HZ
entry.description: DVD-Audio, LPCM DVD tracks, Blu-ray audio tracks, HD DVD audio tracks.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_176_400_HZ
entry.description: Used in HDCD recorders and other professional applications for CD production.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_192_000_HZ
entry.description: Used with audio on professional video equipment. DVD-Audio, LPCM DVD tracks, Blu-ray audio tracks, HD DVD audio tracks.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_328_800_HZ
entry.description: Digital eXtreme Definition. Used for recording and editing Super Audio CDs.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_SAMPLE_RATE_384_000_HZ
entry.description: Highest sample rate available for common software. Allows for precise peak detection.

enum.name: ASV_AUDIO_PCM_FORMAT
enum.description: Count of bit per sample for decoded.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_CODEC_OPUS
entry.description: Opus (RFC 6716) – based on SILK vocoder and CELT codec.

entry.name: ASV_AUDIO_CODEC_RAW_CFG_8000_MONO
entry.description: Raw uncompressed audio (PCM) with 8 000 Hz smaple rate and 1 channel (mono).

message.name: ASV_AUDIO_ONLINE
message.description: Every device that wants to be visible at voice chat and can talk to the others sends this packet at 1 Hz.[!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Audio codec used by this device.
Audio device name in voice chat.

message.name: ASV_AUDIO_STREAM
message.description: Message containing encoded audio data. If, after audio-encoding, one frame exceeds one packet size, multiple packets are used for frame transmitting.[!WRAP_TO_V2_EXTENSION_PACKET!]
message.field: Number of packets for one encoded audio frame.
Packet sequence number (starting with 0 on every encoded frame).
